title: Set pccomputerandcommunication.com as canonical primary URL

requirements.summary: Update user-visible references to use https://pccomputerandcommunication.com as the primary live link and add a canonical tag while keeping the IC URL usable as an alternate.
acceptanceCriteria: Any user-facing place in the frontend that references the live website URL uses `https://pccomputerandcommunication.com` as the default link.
The custom-domain setup documentation reflects `https://pccomputerandcommunication.com` as the primary URL, while noting the IC-provided URL remains available.
Add a canonical URL hint for search engines by including a `<link rel="canonical" href="https://pccomputerandcommunication.com" />` tag in `frontend/index.html`.
No existing navigation, deep links (hash navigation), or section scrolling behavior is broken by these changes.

file_operations.description: Add a canonical URL hint for search engines by inserting `<link rel="canonical" href="https://pccomputerandcommunication.com" />` into the document `<head>` without altering the existing React mount or script tag.

Update the documentation to present `https://pccomputerandcommunication.com` as the primary/canonical URL; replace any current IC-provided URL references (e.g., the icp0.io placeholder) with wording that clearly notes the IC-provided URL remains available as an alternate access URL.
